Module cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool
Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool.model

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool.BaseObject
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool.model.Enemy
public class Enemy
extends BaseObject
Structure for enemy objects. Each created enemy is defined by unique name, short description, image, health points, damage and resistance. Enemy is able to attack, be attacked or store up to 3 items which can be later obtained by players. Enemy level can be later also adjusted to make enemy stronger. Enemy is shown in map in JavaFX Circle object.

    • attack

      public double attack()
      If the enemy is alive, deals damage with its attack
      Returns:
      Integer value representing the attack power.

    • dealMeDmg

      public void dealMeDmg​(double dmg)
      Given damage is decreased according to enemy resistance and then dealt to enemy. If the damage is greater than current enemy HP. HP is set to 0.
      Parameters:
      dmg - Damage value, that will be decreased by certain amount and then dealt to the enemy.
